exec git init
exec git config user.email i@example.com
exec git config user.name someone

exec git add file
exec git commit -m 'commit'
exec ln -s file link
exec git add link
rm link
exec touch link

exec git status --porcelain --branch 
stdout '## master\nAT link'

gitstatus
stdout '&{Porcelain:{NumModified:1 NumConflicts:0 NumUntracked:0 NumStaged:1 IsDetached:false IsInitial:false LocalBranch:master RemoteBranch: AheadCount:0 BehindCount:0} NumStashed:0 HEAD:[a-f0-9]{7} State:Default IsClean:false}'
! stderr .

-- file --
line1
line2
